Discuss on mailing lists

If you need help, you should ask on Stack Overflow with "freemarker" tag! To discuss deeper issues, feature requests, and other FreeMarker-related topics, subscribe to the developer mailing list!

The mailing lists (since 2015-09-03):

  • Developer list: dev@freemarker.incubator.apache.org. Subscribe, Unsubscribe (After clicking on these links, send the appearing empty mail as is.)

  • Commit and Jira notifications: notifications@freemarker.incubator.apache.org. Subscribe, Unsubscribe (After clicking on these links, send the appearing empty mail as is.)

The above mailing lists are hosted by the Apache Software Foundation. For more information about managing mailing lists, see this page...

Retired mailing lists

These are the lists on sourceforge.net, which shouldn't be used anymore.

Archives of retired lists:

  • freemarker-user@lists.sourceforge.net

  • freemarker-devel@lists.sourceforge.net

Manage retired list subscriptions...
